# The `ShouldRunExtraSimpleLoopUnswitch` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A marker analysis to determine if SimpleLoopUnswitch should run again on a given loop. <a href="#details">More...</a>
